result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on November 8, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

NOT ON THE RECORD 

Defendant JAMIE L HARDEL in custody and not in court.  Attorney Daniel G. Mitchell in court for JAMIE L HARDEL.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Statement by Atty Mitchell. Court sets for plea & sentencing on November 8, 2022 at 3:00 p.m.
Return date on September 12, 2022 at 10:30 am.

10:41 AM Defendant JAMIE L HARDEL in court, in custody.  Attorney Daniel G. Mitchell appeared by video for JAMIE L HARDEL.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Mitchell states a prelim has not been held. Atty Mitchell states the defendant will waive the preliminary hearing. Defendant concurs. Court instructs the defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary examination. Defendant waives his/her right to a preliminary examination. Court finds probable cause. Court accepts the waiver of the prelim and binds the defendant over for trial. 

Statement by DA Lapisa - the waiver and information was filed on March 8, 2022. Atty Mitchell has received a copy of the criminal complaint and waives the reading. Atty Mitchell enters a plea of NOT GUILTY on behalf of the defendant. Court will set for Return Date on September 12, 2022 at 10:30 AM. Statement by Atty Mitchell re: earlier court date. Statement by the Court - can contact the judicial assistant.

Court adjourned at 10:44 AM
(Atty Daniel Mitchell)
Second appearance on June 14, 2022 at 10:30 am.

10:10 AM Defendant JAMIE L HARDEL in court, in custody.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Court goes over the document received from the PD's office regarding counsel. Defendant concurs. Court sets for Status of Counsel on June 14, 2022 at 10:30 AM

Court adjourned at 10:11 AM
OSPD Appointment of Counsel Report
Second appearance on May 17, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:41 AM Defendant JAMIE L HARDEL in court, in custody.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant requests a court appointed attorney. def states he qualifies for the public defender but didn't want Atty Kapelis who was the one who was available to him. Court states he will not appoint an attorney at this point but the defendant needs to go through the process. Court schedules Second Appearance for May 17, 2022 at 10:00 AM.

Court adjourned at 10:42 AM.
**PROCESSING COMPLETE**
Status hearing on April 12, 2022 at 10:00 am.

9:49 AM Defendant JAMIE L HARDEL appeared in court, in custody, Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading. Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count. Court instructs defendant of his/her right to an attorney.  Court notes bond has been set. Court instructs defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary hearing. Defendant waives the right to a preliminary hearing. Court instructs defendant of his/her right to counsel. Defendant requests to waives right to counsel. Court accepts waiver. 

Court instructs the defendant regarding his right to a preliminary examination. Defendant waives his/her right to a preliminary examination. Court finds probable cause. Court accepts the waiver of the prelim and binds the defendant over for trial. 

State files an information with the court. Defendant waives any reading. Court determines def stands mute and enters a plea of Not Guilty on behalf of the defendant. Court will set for Status April 12, 2022 at 10:00 AM.

Court adjourned at 9:53 AM.
Initial appearance on March 8, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Warrant Cancelled - Spoke to Sam from Dispatch.
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

1:33 PM Defendant JAMIE L HARDEL appeared by video, in custody, Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. Def has no objection to holding this hearing by zoom. Def did not receive copy of the criminal complaint. Court instructs defendant of his/her right to counsel. DA Laspisa makes bond recommendation. Statement by def regarding bond. Court quashes warrant sets bond at $5,000 Cash Bond with the conditions of: Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department. 

Court sets Initial Appearance for March 8, 2022 at 9:30 AM.

Court adjourned at: 1:35 PM.
Sent to GLSO Feb 28, 2022.
**PROCESSING NEEDED**
